articles.title: China and Canada hit back as Trump tariffs kick in - BBC.com
articles.description: Stock markets in the US, Asia and the UK dip after Trump tariffs kicked in and spark retaliation.
articles.content:
Jennifer MeierhansBusiness reporter, BBC News
Stock markets around the world fell following the introduction of tariffs by President Donald Trump on goods entering the US from China, Canada and Mexi… [+5460 chars]
